name: From Little Things
description:
From Little Things is a speed puzzle game where you have to find and grow 7 different alien plants, then keep them alive while you continue the hunt for those you haven't found yet.

Controls:
Move and turn - WASD
Interact - E
Discard Item - Right click on item
Zoom in and out - Scroll wheel
Close game - Esc
Respawn - delete

Game Objective: Find each seed and put them in their respective pots. Then follow the recipe that appears above it by finding the required item on the map. Once you have fully grown a plant you will have to consistently maintain it otherwise you risk it going back stages in its growth.
